hero.title:
Fresh Produce
From Local Farmers
hero.subtitle: Your one-stop shop for fresh, locally sourced produce, delivered to your door.

auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.selectRole: First, let us know who you are.

role.buyerDesc: Browse and buy fresh produce directly from local farms.
role.farmerDesc: Sell your produce, manage your inventory, and grow your business.
role.adminDesc: Manage users, products, orders, disputes, and system settings.

products.explore: Explore everything we have to offer, fresh from the farm.
products.browse: Browse our collection of farm-fresh products.

farmDetail.notFoundSubtitle: The farm you are looking for does not exist or is not registered with HarvestHub.
farmDetail.noProducts: This farm currently has no products listed on HarvestHub.
farmDetail.descriptionPlaceholder: Welcome to {{farmName}}! We are dedicated to providing the freshest, highest quality produce directly from our fields to your table. We believe in sustainable farming practices and connecting our community with wholesome food. Explore our selection and taste the difference that local, fresh ingredients make.

productDetail.recipeGenerationError: Sorry, an error occurred while generating the recipe.
productDetail.noRelatedProducts: No related products found in this category.

about.title: About Us
